markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Song of Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=4586) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your performances inspire strength in your allies to aid them at physical tasks. You learn the [_song of strength_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1775) composition cantrip.
name: Song of Strength
